attributes.long-description:
As a contractor for NextGen Games in 2027, it’s your job to pilot a remote telepresence drone via your trusted VR headset. Fortunately, work has picked up due to an alien invasion. The United Nations has hired the firm to secure the planet, and rid it of alien infestation. The fate of the world is in your hands.
Gameplay revolves around four major tenets:
- Immersion with Comfort. First-person VR shooters are not normally a good idea due to presence-breaking sickness. However, we think we’ve conquered it by utilizing a new technique integrated into our drones. A first-person VR shooter has never felt this good.
- Intense battles. Individual aliens are not much of a threat, but everything changes when alien families are protecting their beloved nests.
- Replay Value is king. The game is a highly replayable, arcade-style shooter with random elements in four distinct scenes that will keep you coming back for more.
- Leaderboards. Compete against friends to see who is the best pilot.
